hero.subtitle: I create modern websites, AI-powered products, and custom features that help businesses grow.

website.title: Website Development
website.description: Full-stack web applications built with modern frameworks. From landing pages to complex web platforms, I create fast, responsive, and scalable solutions.

ai.title: AI-Powered Products
ai.description: Custom chatbots and AI integrations that enhance user experience. Implement intelligent features using the latest language models and AI technologies.

feature.title: Feature Enhancement
feature.description: Add new capabilities to your existing websites. Whether it's authentication, payments, analytics, or custom functionality - I've got you covered.
